Class SignMessageHelper

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.BaseHelper
us.mn.state.dot.tms.SignMessageHelper
public class SignMessageHelper extends BaseHelper
Helper for dealing with sign messages.
Author:
Douglas Lau, Michael Darter

    • makeHash

      public static String makeHash(SignConfig sc, String inc, String ms, String owner, boolean fb, boolean ps, SignMsgPriority mp, Integer dur)
      Make a name hash based on sign message attributes.
      Parameters:
      sc - Sign configuration.
      inc - Associated incident (original name).
      ms - MULTI string.
      owner - Message owner.
      fb - Flash beacon flag.
      ps - Pixel service flag.
      mp - Message priority.
      dur - Duration (null for indefinite).
      Returns:
      Hash code of sign message.

    • isBlank

      public static boolean isBlank(SignMessage sm)
      Check if a sign message is blank

    • sourceBits

      public static int sourceBits(SignMessage sm)
      Get source bits for a sign message

    • getBitmaps

      public static BitmapGraphic[] getBitmaps(SignMessage sm, DMS dms)
      Get the bitmap graphic for all pages of the specified DMS.
      Parameters:
      sm - SignMessage in question.
      dms - Sign with the graphic.
      Returns:
      Array of bitmaps, one for each page, or null on error.

    • validate

      public static void validate(SignMessage sm, DMS dms) throws InvalidMsgException
      Validate a sign message for a DMS.
      Parameters:
      sm - SignMessage to validate.
      dms - Sign to validate message on.
      Throws:
      InvalidMsgException - if message is not valid.

    • isScheduledSticky

      public static boolean isScheduledSticky(SignMessage sm)
      Check if a message is scheduled and has indefinite duration. This should only be true for messages from "sticky" DMS actions.
      Parameters:
      sm - The sign message.

    • isScheduledExpiring

      public static boolean isScheduledExpiring(SignMessage sm)
      Check if a message is scheduled and expires.
      Parameters:
      sm - The sign message.

    • isOperatorExpiring

      public static boolean isOperatorExpiring(SignMessage sm)
      Check if a message is operator created and expires.
      Parameters:
      sm - The sign message.

    • isRwis

      public static boolean isRwis(SignMessage sm)
      Check if a message came from RWIS subsystem.
      Parameters:
      sm - The sign message.
